price: 74. Les criminels, quant à eux, sont éternellement plongés dans le supplice de la Géhenne,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
